title: could this work? (ekko)
body:
after seeing spotlight I think support ekko could work ha ha
anyone try him as a support yet?

replies.body: Probably works as well as Gnar support.

"Would Ekko work as Support?"

When Ekko was designed (If my memory serves me correct) there were many play styles that actually had Ekko being in the support role. But just like in mid lane when Ekko was about to use his stun the enemy knew so they would all back away to safety or go all-in. So most Summoners that actually play Ekko now, are in jg so you can't see his stun very well until its to late.
